summary: This mod adds a new Standalone male follower.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ffff][size=2][b]Thank you for seeing. [/b][/size][/color]
[img]http://livedoor.blogimg.jp/fakesalvia/imgs/f/e/fe23ebfe.png[/img]

[b][color=#1e84cc][size=3]Ver 1.1____
[/size][/color][/b]
[size=2]His Body became Standalone and got tatoo of the Asian dragon.[/size][size=2]I use "Nudes - FavoredSoulMeshes - ErectVersion" of Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles.[/size]

[color=#a2c4c9][size=5][b]ABOUT THIS MOD____[/b][/size][/color]

This mod adds a new Standalone follower. You can find he[color=#ffff00] the Whiterun Stables[/color].
He is [color=#f4cccc]marriageable[/color] and [color=#f4cccc]essential[/color].
[color=#cc0000][size=3][b]
! Standalone Face Only !
[/b][/size][/color]Please use the favorite Male's Body MOD for him.

Name: [color=#cc0000][size=3][b]Ravus
[/b][/size][/color]Sex: Male
Combat style: 2H Warrior
Level: min 10 to max 100
Magic: Healing
Perk: Light Foot, Silent Roll, Silence, Unhindered, Conditioning


[color=#a2c4c9][size=5][b]Credit____

Northborn Scars by Northborn
